About Settings
SocyMusic is an open-source Android music player written in Java to which everyone can contribute to. Version %s
Media Channel Media channel for audio playback Previous Pause Play Next
Select Directories Internal Storage SD card (%s) Folder is empty Cannot access folder.
Library Folders Configure where to look for songs on your device. Choose the primary colors of your app Theme
Select Playlist: Create New Playlist… Song is already in playlist Do you want to add it anyway? Enter Playlist Name… New Playlist Delete Playlist Are you sure you want to delete this playlist?
Not done loading songs. Please wait. Reloading Songs… Activate SleepTime function: The SleepTime functionality allows you to set a time at which the app will stop playing music and close itself. To allow this functionality you need to switch the below switch to ON and set a time above. Save selected settings
